locations.name: Grand Entrance Hall
locations.description: A vast chamber adorned with marble columns and intricate tapestries that depicted scenes of valor and festivity. The atmosphere is thick with echoes of footfalls against the polished stone floor, and the flicker of torchlight can be seen reflecting off distant suits of armor.
locations.accessibility: Main entrance to the complex, connected to multiple rooms
plotHooks: The carvings on the walls depict the creation of the Elemental Forge
A partially obscured dwarven rune sequence might hint at hidden passages

features.name: Central Fountain
features.description: A large, dry fountain that once flowed with enchanted water.

features.name: Dwarven Statues
features.description: Imposing statues of dwarven heroes flanking the main passages.

dcChecks.description: Recall the significance of the depicted scenes in dwarven history.
Notice signs of recent activity amidst the ancient dust.

encounters.summary: In the Grand Entrance Hall, a vast chamber adorned with marble columns and intricate tapestries that depicted scenes of valor and festivity, the party stood momentarily still, their senses attuned to the echoes of their own footfalls against the polished stone floor. Norn, the strongest among them, surveyed the surroundings with a measure of authority, his keen eyes catching the flicker of torchlight reflecting off a distant suit of armor, hinting at both history and potential danger. Gilly, nimble and curious, wandered closer to the tapestries, her fingers grazing the fabric as she sought to glean hidden stories from the weavings. Elara and Thalor exchanged knowing glances, the air thick with anticipation as they considered their next moves. Just as the atmosphere thickened with the weight of their choices, the party was struck by a sudden realization - they had forgotten an important item back in the previous area they had explored. With a sense of urgency, the group turned on their heels, ready to retrace their steps, the shadows of the hall closing in behind them as they made their way back, leaving the grandeur of the hall momentarily behind.
encounters.impact: The party's decision to leave the hall signifies an urgency to recover an important item, shifting the focus from exploration to retracing their steps.

doors.name: Main Entrance Doors
doors.description: Massive stone doors with intricate elemental designs.

locations.name: Guardians' Chamber
locations.description: A fortified room designed to house the stronghold's defenders. Weapon racks and armor stands line the walls, many still bearing ancient arms.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Grand Entrance Hall
plotHooks: Some of the ancient weapons might be needed to overcome obstacles deeper in the complex

traps.name: Weapon Rack Snare
traps.description: A tripwire that causes weapons to fall on intruders

features.name: Training Dummies
features.description: Ancient training dummies that still move when approached.

features.name: Strategy Table
features.description: A stone table with a partially completed battle plan.

dcChecks.description: Recognize the significance of certain weapons or armor styles.
Notice signs of which weapons have been recently used.

doors.name: Reinforced Door
doors.description: A sturdy door designed to withstand attacks.

locations.name: Hall of Records
locations.description: A vast chamber filled with stone tablets, scrolls, and books detailing the history and knowledge of the dwarven clan. Many records appear to focus on elemental magic and forging techniques.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Grand Entrance Hall
plotHooks: Records might reveal the true purpose and dangers of the Elemental Forge
Hidden messages from past dwarven clan leaders could be discovered
lootTable: Map of secret passages within the complex

features.name: Enchanted Podium
features.description: A podium that magically organizes and retrieves requested information.

features.name: Mural of Dwarven History
features.description: A large mural depicting key events in the clan's history, including the creation of the Elemental Forge.

dcChecks.description: Interpret the historical significance of certain records.
Find specific information about the Elemental Forge or the Ember Enclave.
Understand complex magical theories in the ancient tomes.

doors.name: Archive Entrance
doors.description: A door with a complex locking mechanism based on dwarven runes.

locations.name: Elemental Attunement Chamber
locations.description: A circular room with four distinct sections, each dedicated to one of the primary elements. Magical energy crackles between elemental focuses in the center of the room.
plotHooks: The chamber might be key to stabilizing or deactivating the Elemental Forge
Proper attunement here could grant temporary elemental powers

traps.name: Elemental Surge
traps.description: Crossing elemental quadrants unprepared causes an energy surge

features.name: Elemental Pedestals
features.description: Four pedestals, one in each quadrant, holding elemental focuses.

features.name: Central Attunement Circle
features.description: A runic circle where all four elements converge.

dcChecks.description: Understand the purpose and operation of the attunement ritual.
Navigate between elemental quadrants without triggering surges.

doors.name: Elemental Barrier
doors.description: A shimmering elemental barrier serves as the room's entrance.

locations.name: Apprentice Forges
locations.description: A large, open area filled with multiple smaller forges, anvils, and workbenches. This is where apprentice smiths would learn their craft under the tutelage of master artisans.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Hall of Records
plotHooks: Unfinished projects might provide clues about the Ember Enclave's plans
Ancient forging techniques could be rediscovered here

features.name: Master's Workbench
features.description: A large, central workbench with advanced tools and half-finished projects.

features.name: Elemental Essence Extractor
features.description: A complex apparatus used to infuse items with elemental properties.

dcChecks.description: Deduce the purpose of unfinished projects.
Attempt to complete or understand a complex forging technique.

doors.name: Heavy Workshop Doors
doors.description: Thick doors designed to contain heat and noise.

locations.name: Residential Quarter Entrance
locations.description: A wide, ornate hallway leading to what were once the living quarters of the dwarven clan. Family crests and personal artifacts decorate the walls.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Grand Entrance Hall and deeper residential areas
plotHooks: Personal effects might provide insight into the daily lives of the dwarves who lived here
Hidden family secrets could be uncovered in the residential areas

features.name: Family Crest Wall
features.description: A wall adorned with the crests of prominent dwarven families.

features.name: Ancestral Statue
features.description: A large statue of a revered dwarven ancestor.

dcChecks.description: Recognize the significance of certain family crests or artifacts.
Discover hidden compartments or secret messages in the decor.

doors.name: Residential Wings Doors
doors.description: Ornate doors leading to individual family quarters.

locations.name: Artifact Containment Vault
locations.description: A heavily fortified room designed to house powerful artifacts and treasures. The walls are lined with locked display cases and secure containers.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Guardians' Chamber, heavily secured
plotHooks: A powerful artifact needed to control the Elemental Forge might be stored here
The vault might contain clues about other hidden dwarven strongholds

traps.name: Elemental Ward
traps.description: A powerful ward that unleashes elemental energy on intruders
traps.damage: 5d10 damage of a random elemental type

features.name: Artifact Display Cases
features.description: Magically sealed cases containing powerful items.

features.name: Central Pedestal
features.description: A secure pedestal where the most valuable artifact was once displayed.

dcChecks.description: Identify the nature and powers of contained artifacts.
Attempt to bypass the magical locks on display cases.

doors.name: Vault Doors
doors.description: Massive, magically reinforced doors with multiple locking mechanisms.

locations.name: Water Purification System
locations.description: A complex network of pipes, filters, and magical purification devices that once supplied clean water to the entire stronghold.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Grand Entrance Hall
plotHooks: The water system might be key to flooding out the Ember Enclave
Unusual contaminants in the water could hint at the Enclave's activities

features.name: Central Purification Chamber
features.description: A large chamber where water is magically purified.

features.name: Control Valves
features.description: A series of valves controlling water flow throughout the stronghold.

dcChecks.description: Understand the ecological impact of the purification system.
Determine how to reroute water flow or increase pressure.

doors.name: Watertight Door
doors.description: A door designed to prevent flooding, with a spinning wheel lock.

locations.name: Emergency Escape Tunnel
locations.description: A hidden tunnel designed as an escape route for the stronghold's inhabitants in times of dire need. The passage is narrow and slopes upward towards the surface.
locations.accessibility: Hidden entrance from the Residential Quarter Entrance, leads to the surface
plotHooks: The tunnel might provide a secret way to infiltrate or escape the stronghold
Hidden caches of emergency supplies could be found along the route

traps.name: Collapsible Section
traps.description: A section of the tunnel designed to cave in to block pursuers
traps.damage: 3d6 bludgeoning damage and possibly trapped by debris

features.name: Narrow Passages
features.description: Sections of the tunnel that require squeezing through.

features.name: Air Vents
features.description: Small vents providing fresh air from the surface.

dcChecks.description: Notice the hidden entrance to the tunnel.
Navigate through tight spaces and steep inclines.

doors.name: Concealed Entrance
doors.description: A secret door disguised as part of the wall in the Residential Quarter.

locations.name: Ceremonial Chamber
locations.description: A grand, circular chamber used for important dwarven ceremonies and rituals. Elemental symbols adorn the walls and floor, converging on a central dais.
locations.accessibility: Connected to the Grand Entrance Hall
locations.weatherConditions: Varies based on active elemental energies
plotHooks: An ongoing Ember Enclave ritual might need to be interrupted
Ancient dwarven ceremonies could be the key to controlling the Elemental Forge

features.name: Elemental Focal Points
features.description: Four points around the room dedicated to each element.

features.name: Central Dais
features.description: A raised platform where the primary ritualist would stand.

dcChecks.description: Understand the nature of ongoing or recent rituals.
Recognize the significance of dwarven ceremonial symbols.

doors.name: Ceremonial Doors
doors.description: Large doors engraved with scenes of dwarven ceremonies.
